page.title: 04WEEKDAYS/WEEKENDS WICKERSLEY
page.content: I go downstairs to get my breakfast.I then get my jodphers and my hat.Then I have to pack my lunch up.When I am ready it is around 9.00am.I get there and I go and find my pony Gypsy.If she is in the field I have to go and catch her.I then tack her up for someone to ride her.I usually have to lead.If they do not need leading I go and change her water.We have our dinner at 1.00 to 2.00.After dinner I ride Gypsy myself.I go home at about 4.30pm.At home I play for a bit until bedtime.If I do not go riding I just play all day.At dinner time my Gran and Grandad come.
